cause.description:
Dear Friends:
Kenya project needs about TWO hundred 128 megabits - 133 MHz speed and ONE hundred 256 megabits - 133 Hz speed Without this help Kenya Project will not be able to ship about 300 computers. One memory card costs about $40.00 each. Willing donors can purchase the memories and ship them to us through the school address:
IF YOU HAVE ANY IDEAS HOW I CAN GET SOME OF THESE MEMORIES PLEASE ADVISE ME.
Kenya Project Inc. 49 Clinton Ave Dobbs Ferry NY 10522
Thank you all.
Jude Ndambuki
1. Kenya must have computers
2. Mr.
cause.mission: Serve the needs of the beautiful Jude Ndambuki
cause.name: Project Kenya
